name: MALT BEVERAGE DISTRIBUTORS ASSOCIATION, Gabler's Beverage Distributor, Inc. and PKD, Inc., Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellee Ohio Springs, Inc. t/a Sheetz, Intervenor
name_abbreviation: Malt Beverage Distributors Ass'n v. Pennsylvania Liquor Control Board

parties: MALT BEVERAGE DISTRIBUTORS ASSOCIATION, Gabler’s Beverage Distributor, Inc. and PKD, Inc., Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellee Ohio Springs, Inc. t/a Sheetz, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of July, 2016, the Application to Dismiss is GRANTED. Each party is to bear its own costs.
The Application to Stay the Briefing Schedule is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
141 A.3d 1237
MALT BEVERAGE DISTRIBUTORS ASSOCIATION, Gabler’s Beverage Distributor, Inc. and PKD, Inc., Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD, Appellee Ohio Springs, Inc. t/a Sheetz, Intervenor.
No. 8 MAP 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 18, 2016.
